resources.string: \tList controls: \n\- To add an item to the list, enter the name in the text box, and press the (+) icon. \n\- To remove an item from the list, enter the name in the text box, and press the garbage can icon.

Television Controls: 
\- Power on or off the TV with the top-left button. 
\- Navigate the menus with the arrow buttons. 
\- Select a menu item with the Enter button, located in the center of the arrows 
\- Enter the desired channel in the text box below the arrows. 
\- The back button, located to the bottom left, returns you to your previous page or channel. 
\- The microphone prompts you to speak aloud the desired channel to go to, rather than typing it in the text box.

Light Controls: 
\- Move the sliders to control the lights. 
\- Left to dim or shut off, right to brighten or turn on. 
\- Click the "CHOOSE COLOR" button to change the light's color.
\tBlinds Controls: \n\- Move the sliders control the blinds. \n\- Left to lower, right to raise.
